title: Sunraysia Ukulele Network
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Community life

abstract: A musical way for the Mildura community to relax and have fun. Filmed as part of  'ACMI in the Regions: Stories from Mildura'.
description: An unlikely group of people come together once a month to share their love of the Ukulele. They meet on the last Sunday of each month at a local landmark called The Old Cottage where they play the uke and have a sing-a-long. Everyone is welcome, from beginners to more experienced players, the door is always open.
